---
title: "Mix ggplot with wheatmap"
output: html_document
---

The following plot a matrix of mixed ggplot and wheatmap.
```{r}
library(wheatmap)
library(ggplot2)
WMatrix(list(qplot(1:10,10:1), qplot(10:1,10:1), qplot(1:7,7:1), qplot(5:1,5:1), WHeatmap(matrix(1:4,nrow=2))), ncols=3)

WHeatmap(matrix(1:4,nrow=2)) + WGG(qplot(rnorm(50,4,3),geom='density'), TopOf())
```
